thread.title: Drake caught on video in Manchester restaurant ahead of his Arena gigs
thread.title_full: Drake caught on video in Manchester restaurant ahead of his Arena gigs

author: Lucy Lovell
title: Drake caught on video in Manchester restaurant ahead of his Arena gigs
text:
Drake caught on video in Manchester restaurant ahead of his Arena gigs Diners can be heard squealing with excitement Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Attention Manchester, Drake is in town. 
Just named the WORLD’S best-selling recording artist of 2016, Drake is on the northern leg of his UK tour, set to play the first of his two Manchester Arena shows tonight. 
But some lucky locals spotted the Canadian pin-up in a slick Manchester restaurant ahead of his performance. The Hold On singer was caught on camera entering the swish Italian restaurant San Carlo last night with an entourage of around ten people. 
En route to one of the restaurant's private booths, Drake is seen pausing for a second as he takes down his hood, at which point diners start squealing as they recognise the world-famous musician. 
Other diners were a little more relaxed about his appearance, tweeting "When your sat scranning your pizza in San Carlo Manchester and Drake walks in." 
An insider from the King Street West restaurant confirmed the sighting, saying that Drake arrived late last night, and was a very laid-back customer. 
It's the second time that Drake has been spotted partying in Manchester recently. On Wednesday night Drake booked out the entire Zouk tea bar and grill on Manchester’s Chester Street to party with his crew and pals after his gig at Leeds’ First Direct Arena. Read More New housewife on Real Housewives of Cheshire 'more Geordie Shore than Golden Triangle' Drake hires out Zouk in Manchester until 4am and enjoys food and shisha with friends and UK rapper Giggs whilst on World tour (Photo: www.icelebtv.com) 
He partied with pals including rap star Giggs, who is the support act on his tour, and the group stayed out until 4am enjoying food and shisha. 
Zouk is a favoured hangout for Drake, who has been there on three previous visits to Manchester. 
Hold on, we're going to Zouk. Read More
